movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets, but a final job asks him to plant an idea instead.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity as Earth becomes uninhabitable.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who pushes Gotham toward chaos and tests the city's moral limits.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.description: In his early years as Batman, Bruce Wayne hunts a serial killer while uncovering corruption in Gotham.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a fearless stranger form an underground fight club that spirals out of control.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: A kind-hearted man with a simple outlook unwittingly influences major historical events while chasing true love.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A hacker learns reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion to free humanity from machine control.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A betrayed Roman general becomes a gladiator and seeks justice against the emperor who destroyed his life.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A young jazz drummer endures brutal training under an abusive instructor in pursuit of greatness.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.description: Two rival magicians escalate a dangerous feud, sacrificing everything to create the ultimate illusion.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family infiltrates a wealthy household, triggering a dark clash of class and survival.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: A troubled man in Gotham descends into madness and becomes the symbol of a violent social upheaval.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: A young nobleman must survive the deadly desert planet Arrakis, where the most valuable resource in the universe is found.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: A replicant officer uncovers a secret that could destabilize society and searches for the missing Rick Deckard.

movies.title: Mad Max Fury Road
movies.description: In a wasteland ruled by warlords, Max and Furiosa race across the desert to escape tyranny and spark rebellion.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.description: A retired hitman returns to the underworld to take revenge, unleashing a relentless campaign of action.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: Two lovers from different worlds meet aboard the Titanic as the ship's doomed voyage changes their lives forever.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A former Marine bonds with the Na'vi on Pandora and must choose between his mission and a new world.

movies.title: Avengers Endgame
movies.description: After a catastrophic loss, the Avengers regroup for a final plan to undo the damage and restore hope.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging head of a mafia dynasty transfers power to his reluctant son, reshaping the family's fate and legacy.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer whose murders are inspired by the seven deadly sins.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: An FBI trainee seeks help from imprisoned cannibal Hannibal Lecter to catch a serial killer on the loose.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a criminal mole play a deadly game as both sides try to uncover each other's identity.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: A young man rises through the mob world, revealing the glamour and violence of organized crime.

movies.title: Scarface
movies.description: A Cuban immigrant becomes a powerful drug lord in Miami, driven by ambition and consumed by paranoia.

movies.title: Heat
movies.description: A determined detective and a master thief collide in Los Angeles as both lives unravel under pressure.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: A death row guard encounters an enigmatic prisoner whose presence brings extraordinary and unsettling events.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.description: A hunter finds drug money and becomes the target of a relentless killer, while a sheriff tries to make sense of the violence.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: A charismatic stockbroker builds an empire through fraud and excess before his reckless life catches up with him.

movies.title: Logan
movies.description: An aging Wolverine protects a young mutant while evading powerful enemies in a bleak near future.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: A U.S. Marshal investigates a disappearance at a remote psychiatric facility, only to face disturbing truths.

movies.title: The Imitation Game
movies.description: Mathematician Alan Turing leads a secret wartime team to crack the Enigma code and change history.

movies.title: Prisoners
movies.description: After two girls go missing, a desperate father takes matters into his own hands as a detective races the clock.

movies.title: Gone Girl
movies.description: When a woman disappears, her husband becomes the prime suspect as secrets and media pressure explode.

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.description: A ballerina spirals under intense pressure while preparing for a demanding role that blurs reality and obsession.

movies.title: The Big Short
movies.description: A group of outsiders predicts the housing market collapse and bets against the system before the 2008 crisis hits.

movies.title: American Psycho
movies.description: A wealthy New York banker hides a chilling double life beneath his perfect image and ruthless ambition.

movies.title: Requiem for a Dream
movies.description: Four lives unravel as addiction and obsession intensify, turning dreams into desperation.

movies.title: Her
movies.description: A lonely writer forms an intimate relationship with an AI operating system that evolves beyond expectations.

movies.title: Drive
movies.description: A quiet getaway driver becomes entangled in a dangerous criminal world while trying to protect someone he cares about.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: The creation of Facebook sparks ambition, betrayal, and lawsuits as friendships fracture behind a tech revolution.

movies.title: Nightcrawler
movies.description: A driven freelancer films nighttime crime scenes in Los Angeles, pushing ethics aside for success and headlines.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist is recruited to communicate with mysterious aliens as global tensions rise and time itself feels unstable.

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.description: A programmer evaluates a humanoid robot's intelligence, entering a psychological game of power and control.

movies.title: Moonlight
movies.description: A young man grows up in Miami while grappling with identity, family, and love across three stages of his life.

series.title: Breaking Bad
series.description: A high school chemistry teacher turns to making methamphetamine after a terminal diagnosis, dragging his family into a dangerous criminal world.

series.title: Game of Thrones
series.description: Noble families battle for power in Westeros as ancient threats awaken beyond the Wall.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.description: In 1980s Indiana, a group of kids face government secrets and supernatural horrors linked to an alternate dimension.

series.title: The Boys
series.description: A vigilante team takes on corrupt superheroes who abuse their fame, power, and corporate backing.

series.title: Peaky Blinders
series.description: A Birmingham gang led by Tommy Shelby rises through crime and politics in post–World War I England.

series.title: Dark
series.description: A child’s disappearance exposes time travel, family secrets, and a tangled web spanning generations in a small German town.

series.title: Narcos
series.description: The rise and fall of major drug cartels is told through the eyes of traffickers and the agents hunting them.

series.title: Money Heist
series.description: A mastermind known as the Professor recruits criminals for ambitious heists that push planning—and loyalty—to the limit.

series.title: Chernobyl
series.description: A dramatized account of the 1986 nuclear disaster and the people who fought to contain its devastating consequences.

series.title: The Witcher
series.description: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, navigates war, destiny, and magic as his path intertwines with a powerful sorceress and a mysterious child.

series.title: Better Call Saul
series.description: The origin story of Jimmy McGill as he evolves into Saul Goodman, blending legal drama with the criminal underworld.

series.title: The Sopranos
series.description: Mob boss Tony Soprano balances family life and organized crime while exploring his struggles in therapy.

series.title: Westworld
series.description: In a futuristic theme park of lifelike androids, the line between guests and hosts collapses into a violent awakening.

series.title: Mindhunter
series.description: FBI agents pioneer criminal profiling by interviewing serial killers to understand how they think—and how to stop them.

series.title: The Mandalorian
series.description: A lone bounty hunter in the Star Wars galaxy takes on a mysterious child and becomes a reluctant protector.

series.title: House of the Dragon
series.description: Centuries before Game of Thrones, House Targaryen fractures into civil war as rivals fight for the Iron Throne.

series.title: Ozark
series.description: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks to launder money, but danger escalates with every compromise.

series.title: True Detective
series.description: An anthology of crime investigations where detectives confront dark cases that reshape their lives and beliefs.

series.title: Vikings
series.description: Legendary warrior Ragnar Lothbrok and his heirs rise through exploration, conquest, and brutal power struggles.

series.title: The Last of Us
series.description: In a post-pandemic world, a hardened survivor escorts a teenage girl who may hold the key to humanity’s future.

series.title: Succession
series.description: A media tycoon’s children compete for control of the family empire as loyalty and ambition collide.

series.title: The Bear
series.description: A fine-dining chef returns home to run his family’s sandwich shop, facing grief, chaos, and high-stakes kitchen pressure.

series.title: Black Mirror
series.description: A dark anthology exploring how technology can twist society, relationships, and human nature in unsettling ways.

series.title: Dexter
series.description: A forensic analyst leads a secret life as a serial killer who targets other murderers, guided by a strict code.

series.title: Mr Robot
series.description: A cybersecurity engineer and hacker is pulled into a revolutionary plot, while paranoia and identity blur his reality.

series.title: Severance
series.description: Employees undergo a procedure that splits work and personal memories, uncovering a corporate mystery with chilling implications.

series.title: Boardwalk Empire
series.description: During Prohibition, Atlantic City power broker Nucky Thompson navigates politics, crime, and rivals in a booming underworld.

series.title: Fargo
series.description: A crime anthology of darkly comedic, violent stories where ordinary lives spiral into chaos across the Midwest.

series.title: Hannibal
series.description: A profiler forms a dangerous bond with brilliant psychiatrist Hannibal Lecter, unaware of his true, monstrous nature.

series.title: The Americans
series.description: Two Soviet spies pose as an American couple during the Cold War, juggling missions, marriage, and growing personal conflict.

anime.title: Attack on Titan
anime.description: Humanity hides behind massive walls to survive against Titans—until a breach forces a young soldier into a brutal war that reshapes everything he believes.

anime.title: Demon Slayer
anime.description: After his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into a demon, a kind-hearted boy joins the Demon Slayer Corps to find a cure and take revenge.

anime.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
anime.description: A teenager becomes host to a deadly curse and enters a secret world of sorcerers, where exorcising monsters comes with terrifying consequences.

anime.title: Naruto Shippuden
anime.description: Older and stronger, Naruto returns to protect his village from escalating threats while chasing his promise to save a friend lost to darkness.

anime.title: One Piece
anime.description: A rubber-powered pirate captain sails the seas with his crew, chasing the legendary treasure 'One Piece' to become King of the Pirates.

anime.title: Death Note
anime.description: A student finds a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written inside, igniting a mind game with a brilliant detective over justice and power.

anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist Brotherhood
anime.description: Two brothers who broke a taboo in alchemy search for the Philosopher’s Stone to restore their bodies—uncovering a national conspiracy along the way.

anime.title: Bleach
anime.description: A teen gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and is pulled into battles against spirits and supernatural enemies spanning the living world and beyond.

anime.title: Dragon Ball Z
anime.description: Goku and his allies defend Earth from ever-stronger foes, pushing their limits through epic battles, transformations, and interstellar threats.

anime.title: Tokyo Ghoul
anime.description: A college student becomes half-ghoul after a transplant and must navigate a violent underground society while struggling to keep his humanity.

anime.title: Steins Gate
anime.description: A group of friends accidentally discovers a way to send messages to the past, triggering a dangerous chain of timelines and heartbreaking sacrifices.

anime.title: Cowboy Bebop
anime.description: In a stylish sci-fi future, a crew of bounty hunters drifts from job to job while haunted by the past they can’t outrun.

anime.title: Code Geass
anime.description: A disgraced prince gains a power that can command anyone, then leads a revolution using strategy, deception, and morally costly choices.

anime.title: Vinland Saga
anime.description: Set in the Viking Age, a boy driven by revenge is pulled into war and politics, slowly confronting what it means to live for something beyond violence.

anime.title: Monster
anime.description: A brilliant doctor saves a child who grows into a chilling menace, sending him across Europe in a tense psychological hunt for the truth.

anime.title: Erased
anime.description: A man with an unexplained ability to rewind time is thrown back to childhood, racing to stop a series of kidnappings and a tragedy that shaped his life.

anime.title: Parasyte
anime.description: Alien parasites invade Earth by taking over human bodies—except one fails to reach a boy’s brain, forcing an uneasy coexistence and a fight for survival.

anime.title: Akame ga Kill
anime.description: A young fighter joins an assassination squad targeting a corrupt empire, where every victory comes with brutal losses and impossible choices.

anime.title: Samurai Champloo
anime.description: A tea waitress recruits two rival swordsmen to help her find the 'samurai who smells of sunflowers' in a road trip blending Edo-era action and hip-hop style.

anime.title: Psycho Pass
anime.description: In a future where an algorithm judges criminal intent, inspectors hunt threats in a society that blurs justice, surveillance, and free will.

anime.title: Made in Abyss
anime.description: A girl and a mysterious robot descend into a colossal abyss filled with relics and horrors, where each layer exacts a heavier physical and emotional toll.

anime.title: Dororo
anime.description: A cursed warrior hunts demons to reclaim stolen body parts, traveling with a streetwise orphan in a grim, mythical version of feudal Japan.

anime.title: Devilman Crybaby
anime.description: A sensitive teen merges with a demon to fight an awakening apocalypse, as love, paranoia, and violence spiral into a devastating finale.

anime.title: Mob Psycho 100
anime.description: A mild-mannered boy with overwhelming psychic powers tries to live a normal life, but emotions—and spirits—keep pushing him toward explosive limits.

anime.title: Odd Taxi
anime.description: A reserved taxi driver gets entangled in a missing-person case, exposing a web of secrets across Tokyo’s underworld and everyday lives.

anime.title: 86 Eighty Six
anime.description: A segregated group of soldiers is forced to fight a hopeless war, while a distant handler tries to treat them as human in a system built to erase them.

anime.title: Ranking of Kings
anime.description: A deaf, underestimated prince sets out to become a great king, forming an unlikely bond that helps him face betrayal, fear, and destiny.

anime.title: Tokyo Revengers
anime.description: A down-on-his-luck adult jumps back to his teenage years and tries to rewrite the future by changing the fate of a violent gang—and the people he loves.

anime.title: Horimiya
anime.description: Two classmates with hidden sides to their lives grow close, turning everyday school moments into a warm romance about being seen for who you really are.

anime.title: Chainsaw Man
anime.description: A broke teen merges with a chainsaw devil and joins a public safety unit, chasing simple dreams while facing grotesque demons and darker human agendas.
